In the start of 1585, Nij=F4 Akizane (155=
6-1619) was sadaijin, but in that year he 
was also made kanpaku (an office=
 he later resumed in 1615) but resigned it in 
Hideyoshi's favor a few mont=
hs later.

In 1585, the udaijin was Kikutei Harusue (1542-1617). It was Har=
usue who 
proposed Hideyoshi take the office of kanpaku.

On 7-11-1585, Sad=
aijin Hashiba Hideyoshi was made kanpaku.

Tony
